Alert Name: bush
Bush wants American World Bank chief
In interview, president plays down speculation about outgoing British PM Blair succeeding Wolfowitz
05/21/07 07:04 PM, EDT
President Bush said Monday he wants an American to succeed Paul Wolfowitz as president of the World Bank, playing down speculation he might turn to departing British Prime Minister Tony Blair for the job.
